metadata.title: Personal Finance - Manage Your Finances

error.title: Error - Personal Finance
error.description: An error occurred during the process.

forgot-password.title: Forgot Password - Personal Finance
forgot-password.description: Reset your password to regain access to your personal finance account.

new-user.title: Welcome - Personal Finance
new-user.description: Your account has been successfully created. Start managing your finances now.

reset-password.title: Reset Password - Personal Finance
reset-password.description: Set a new password for your personal finance account.

signin.description: Access your personal financial management platform.

verify-request.description: Check your email for a sign-in link to access your personal finance account.

home.title: Personal Finance - Manage Your Finances
home.description:
Professional platform for personal finance management.
Monitor, plan and optimize your financial resources.

signin.title: Sign In - Personal Finance
signin.description: Access your personal financial management platform.

error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
error.accountNotLinked: This account is already linked with another provider.
error.oauthError: An error occurred during OAuth authentication.
error.generic: An error occurred during sign in. Please try again.
error.inactiveAccount: Your account is not active. Please contact support.
error.connection: Connection error. Please try again later.
error.registrationSuccessButLogin: Registration successful, but error during login.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Please enter your email to reset the password.
forgotPassword.emailNotSent: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.

resetEmail.subject: Reset Your Password
resetEmail.body: Click the following link to reset your password: {resetUrl}

forgotPassword.emailSent: Reset link sent to your email.
forgotPassword.serverError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
forgotPassword.note: If you don't receive an email, please check your spam folder or try again.

passwords.short: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

resetPassword.success: Password reset successfully. Redirecting to sign in...
resetPassword.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Please enter your new password below.

errorPage.title: Authentication Error
errorPage.description: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again.

newUser.title: Complete Your Profile
newUser.description: Welcome, ${session.user.name || session.user.email}! To continue, please fill in the missing information.
newUser.note: You can also edit this information later from the profile settings.
newUser.formError: Error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again.

verifyRequest.title: Check Your Email
verifyRequest.description: A sign-in link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to sign in.
verifyRequest.note: You can also edit this information later from the profile settings.
verifyRequest.error: An error occurred while resending the email. Please try again later.

dashboard.title: Dashboard - Personal Finance
dashboard.description: Complete dashboard for controlling your personal finances.

accounts.title: Your Accounts
accounts.emptyState: No accounts found. Add an account to get started.
